Package orange.parser

Class Parser

java.lang.Object
orange.parser.Parser
public class Parser extends Object
Parses user input and extracts command information for processing. This class handles parsing different command types and extracting relevant data.
See Also:
  • OrangeException
  • Ui
  • DateParser

  • Method Details

    • updateLine

      public void updateLine(String line)
      Updates the stored command line with new user input.
      Parameters:
      line - The new user input command line.

    • scanForCommandWord

      public String scanForCommandWord()
      Extracts and validates the command word from the user input.
      Returns:
      The extracted command word if valid, otherwise an empty string.

    • parseTodo

      public static String parseTodo() throws OrangeException
      Parses a "todo" task command and extracts the task description.
      Returns:
      The extracted todo task description.
      Throws:
      OrangeException - If the todo task description is missing.

    • parseDeadline

      public static ArrayList<String> parseDeadline() throws OrangeException
      Parses a "deadline" task command and extracts the task description and due date.
      Returns:
      A list containing the task description and due date.
      Throws:
      OrangeException - If the deadline format is incorrect or missing.

    • parseEvent

      public static ArrayList<String> parseEvent() throws OrangeException
      Parses an "event" task command and extracts the task description, start time, and end time.
      Returns:
      A list containing the task description, start time, and end time.
      Throws:
      OrangeException - If the event format is incorrect or missing.

    • parseMark

      public static int parseMark() throws OrangeException
      Parses and extracts the task number for marking as done.
      Returns:
      The task number to mark.
      Throws:
      OrangeException - If the task number is missing or invalid.

    • parseUnMark

      public static int parseUnMark() throws OrangeException
      Parses and extracts the task number for unmarking as done.
      Returns:
      The task number to unmark.
      Throws:
      OrangeException - If the task number is missing or invalid.

    • parseDelete

      public static int parseDelete() throws OrangeException
      Parses and extracts the task number for deletion.
      Returns:
      The task number to delete.
      Throws:
      OrangeException - If the task number is missing or invalid.

    • parseFind

      public static String parseFind() throws OrangeException
      Parses and extracts the search keyword for finding tasks.
      Returns:
      The search keyword.
      Throws:
      OrangeException - If the keyword is missing.

    • parseCheckTasksOnDate

      public static LocalDate parseCheckTasksOnDate() throws OrangeException
      Parses and extracts the date for checking tasks scheduled on that date.
      Returns:
      The parsed LocalDate object representing the date.
      Throws:
      OrangeException - If the date is missing or invalid.
